solution.text:
Substituting the value of \(x=\frac {1}{_{j}_^2}\,\) in \(p(x) = _{{j**2}}_x -1\,\), we get,
\(p(\frac{1}{_{j}_^2}) = (_{{j**2}}_ \times \frac{1}{_{j}_^2}) -1\)
\(\Rightarrow p(\frac{1}{_{j}_^2}) = (_{{j**2}}_ \times \frac{1}{_{{j**2}}_}) -1\)
\(\Rightarrow p(\frac{1}{_{j}_^2}) = 1-1=0\)
Therefore, \(x=\frac{1}{_{j}_^2}\,\) is a zero of the polynomial \(p(x) = _{{j**2}}_x -1\)
